meta.videoTitle: Goals Toolkit: How to Set & Achieve Your Goals

title_zh: 工具4：视觉提醒迷思；“便利贴谬误”

paragraphList.text_en: The myth of the "Post-It Fallacy" as a tool for goal setting and pursuing objectives has been debunked. The common belief that by writing down a goal on a Post-It note and placing it in a visible location will increase the likelihood of achieving that goal has been proven to be ineffective. This misconception stems from the fact that our visual system is wired to adapt to regular stimuli in our environment, whether it is a limited or cluttered space. Anything that is consistently seen in our visual field tends to get disregarded over time as our brain cancels out familiar visual cues.
paragraphList.text_zh: “便利贴谬误”作为设定目标和追求目标的工具的神话已被揭穿。普遍的信念是，在便利贴上写下一个目标，并将其放在可见位置，会增加实现该目标的可能性，但事实证明这是无效的。这种误解源自于我们的视觉系统是如何适应环境中的常规刺激，无论是空间有限还是杂乱无序。在我们的视野中始终存在的任何事物往往会随着时间被忽视，因为我们的大脑会取消熟悉的视觉线索。

paragraphList.text_en: The key to avoiding this adaptation and increasing the effectiveness of visual reminders is to introduce novelty and change. Instead of leaving the same Post-It note on your mirror or refrigerator day after day, a more successful approach is to rewrite your goal daily and place it in different locations. By refreshing the visual cue regularly, you engage the brain's areas associated with assessing novelty and emotionality, thereby preventing the habitual ignoring of the reminder.
paragraphList.text_zh: 避免适应并提高视觉提醒的有效性的关键是引入新颖和变化。与其每天在镜子或冰箱上留下相同的便条备忘录，更成功的方法是每天重新书写你的目标并将其放在不同的位置。通过定期刷新视觉提示，您能让大脑与评估新颖性和情感相关的区域保持活跃，从而避免习惯性地忽视提醒。

paragraphList.text_en: For those who prefer to use visual reminders in their goal-setting process, the advice is to update them daily to maintain their impact. This adjustment serves to prevent the brain from becoming accustomed to the reminder and dismissing it as a familiar sight. While technology, such as app notifications, can also serve as visual reminders, the same principle applies – regular updates and variations are crucial to combat the brain's tendency to tune out repetitive stimuli.
paragraphList.text_zh: 对于那些更喜欢在设定目标过程中使用视觉提示的人来说，建议是每天更新它们，以保持它们的影响。这种调整旨在防止大脑变得习惯于这个提醒，从而将其视为熟悉的景象。虽然技术，比如应用程序通知，也可以作为视觉提示，但同样的原则适用 - 定期更新和变化至关重要，以抵抗大脑对重复刺激的忽视倾向。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, the "Post-It Fallacy" highlights the importance of understanding how our brains process visual information and the need for continual novelty to maintain the effectiveness of visual reminders in achieving our goals. By actively refreshing visual cues and introducing variety in their placement, individuals can harness the power of visual reminders as a valuable tool in their goal pursuit journey.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总结一下，“便笺错误观念”突显了理解我们的大脑如何处理视觉信息的重要性，以及需要不断更新以保持视觉提醒在实现目标方面的有效性。通过积极更新视觉线索并在放置位置上引入变化，个人可以利用视觉提醒的力量作为实现目标的有价值工具。
